data.name: Elementis
data.description: Elementis is a leading producer of specialty personal care ingredients. Every day, our personal care ingredients provide consumers the protection, moisturization and elegant sensorial experiences they need and want. We apply our advanced expertise in rheology as a global leader in active ingredients for antiperspirants. Our portfolio of green products includes natural clay rheology modifiers -- we own the world’s largest source of high-quality hectorite natural clay -- and bio-functional active ingredients.

data.name: Bentone
data.description: A range of efficient and high performance organoclays used as viscosifiers, rheology modifiers and suspension aids in a variety of markets.

data.name: Bentone Gel
data.description: A range of efficient and high performance organoclays used as viscosifiers, rheology modifiers and suspension aids in a variety of markets.

data.name: Meadowestolide
data.description: MEADOWESTOLIDE® is a unique, functionally significant derivative of Meadowfoam Seed Oil. The development of this estolide represents a new level of advanced ingredient technology. The estolide is a dimeric molecule, which is structurally sophisticated and functionally active.  MEADOWESTOLIDE® provides measureable and meaningful consumer benefits. In hair, the estolide improves intra-fiber moisture retention and thereby imparts protection from thermal damage, while restoring the elasticity and reducing the coefficient of friction of the hair cuticle surface to prevent mechanical damage.  In skincare systems, MEADOWESTOLIDE® helps to adjust the hydration levels of the interstitial spaces and provides significant moisturization benefits.  These benefits are often perceived as softer, more pliant tissue. Initial investigations suggest that the estolide will prove to be a very important agent in protecting skin from the damaging effects of a variety of common causes. MEADOWESTOLIDE® has been incorporated into decorative cosmetics where significant attributes were observed including improved elegance in product texture and, in the case of pigment delivery, considerably better color pay-off”.

data.name: BENTONE HYDROCLAY
data.description: BENTONE HYDROCLAY a new range of water-phase rheology modifiers sourced from nature

data.name: Meadowlactone
data.description: MEADOWLACTONE® contains a cyclical lactone ring derived from a 5-hydroxy moiety on the Meadowfoam fatty acid, in a Meadowfoam fatty acid matrix. The lactone ring confers a hydrophilic nature to that terminal end of the molecule while the long fatty acid chain confers lipophilic attributes to the rest of the molecule.  MEADOWLACTONE® has amphoteric properties, since the lactone ring will open and close as a function of pH and the ionic character of the environment.  MEADOWLACTONE® can help provide balanced moisturization, to improve tone, elasticity and help reduce dryness of the skin.  MEADOWLACTONE® can help reduce irritancy caused by some products.

data.name: Thixcin® R PC
data.description: Thixcin® R PC is a non-hygroscopic derivative of castor oil that imparts a high degree of thixotropic thickening in cosmetics mineral, vegetable and silicones oils, as well as low-polarity aliphatic solvents. Thixcin® R PC provides thixotropy and imparts good pay-off in stick products; improves product stability when used in the oil phase of emulsions, and can be used as a binder in pressed powder formulations.

data.name: Bentone Gel® ISD V
data.description: BENTONE GEL ISD V provides thermostable viscosity control of the emulsion's oil phase, improves application properties, enhances skin-feel by masking greasy or tacky components and imparts a pleasant residual silkiness to the skin.

data.name: Bentone Gel® VS-5 V
data.description: This grade is designed to impart rheological control and suspension to organic- and silicone-based cosmetics. BENTONE GEL VS-5 PC V is a specially prepared dispersion of an organically modified hectorite in a D5 silicone.

data.name: Meadowestolide®
data.description:
MEADOWESTOLIDE provides measureable and meaningful consumer benefits. In hair, the estolide improves intra-fiber moisture retention and thereby imparts protection from thermal damage, while restoring the elasticity and reducing the coefficient of friction of the hair cuticle surface to prevent mechanical damage. In skincare systems, MEADOWESTOLIDE helps to adjust the hydration levels of the interstitial spaces and provides significant moisturization benefits. These benefits are often perceived as softer, more pliant tissue. Initial investigations suggest that the estolide will prove to be a very important agent in protecting skin from the damaging effects of a variety of common causes.

Download Formulation

data.name: Bentone Gel® GTCC V
data.description: BENTONE GEL GTCC V is particularly useful in anhydrous systems, emulsions and can be used in cold process systems. It provides thermostable viscosity control of the emulsion's oil phase, improves application properties, enhances skin-feel by masking greasy or tacky components and imparts a pleasant residual silkiness to the skin.

data.name: Fancol® CB
data.description: FANCOL CB is Cocoa Butter USP/NF grade. It is a skin conditioning occlusive agent and may be used as a skin protectant in OTC drug products.

data.name: Aloxicoll® L
data.description: ALOXICOLL® type L is a standard antiperspirant active. Its efficacy is due to the precipitation of basic Aluminum Chlorohydrate polymer complexes in the upper part of the sweat glands. These polymers can be measured by HPLC. A typical HPLC trace for ALOXICOLL® L can be seen below, indicating the characteristic polymer distribution from and 1 to band 4.

data.name: Fancol® Shea butter
data.description: FANCOL SHEA BUTTER shows its ability to protect the skin from sun and helps to ease superficial skin irritation.

data.name: MICRO-DRY™ 323
data.description: MICRO-DRY 323 is the most popular aerosol grade of standard Aluminum Chlorohydrate. An impalpable aluminum chlorohydrate with 97% minimum < 45 microns.

It provides thermostable viscosity control of the emulsion's oil phase, improves application properties, enhances skin-feel by masking greasy or tacky components and imparts a pleasant residual silkiness to the skin.

data.name: Bentone Gel® MIO V

data.name: Bentone Gel® EUG V
data.description: BENTONE GEL EUG V is particularly useful in anhydrous systems, emulsions and can be used in cold process systems. It provides thermostable viscosity control of the emulsion's oil phase, improves application properties, enhances skin-feel by masking greasy or tacky components and imparts a pleasant residual silkiness to the skin.

data.name: Bentone Gel® VS-5PC V HV
data.description: This grade is designed to impart rheological control and suspension to organic- and silicone-based cosmetics. BENTONE GEL VS-5 PC V is a specially prepared dispersion of an organically modified hectorite in a D5 silicone.

data.name: Bentone Gel® PTM V
data.description: BENTONE GEL PTM V delivers a combination of benefits in a single, easy to use product. It is designed to impart rheological control and suspension to the organic- and silicone-based cosmetics, while providing cushion emollience, high pigment wetting, and glossing films.

data.name: Bentone Gel® DM5 V
data.description: Bentone Gel® DM5 V is a specially prepared dispersion of a non-animal origin organically modified hectorite clay in dimethicone. Bentone Gel® DM5 V delivers a combination of benefits in a single, easy to use product. It is designed to impart rheological control and suspension to both organic and silicone based cosmetics. It is an easily spreadable, non-oily emollient, which leaves a soft, non-tacky skin feel. Bentone Gel® DM5 V is also particularly useful in emulsions and can be used in "cold process" systems. Bentone Gel® DM5 V is an excellent alternative to cyclopentasiloxane based products.

data.name: Bentone Gel® VS-5 V HV
data.description: This grade is designed to impart rheological control and suspension to organic- and silicone-based cosmetics. BENTONE GEL VS-5 PC V is a specially prepared dispersion of an organically modified hectorite in a D5 silicone.

data.name: Bentone Gel® PTIS V
data.description: BENTONE GEL PTIS V delivers a combination of benefits in a single, easy to use product. It is designed to impart rheological control and suspension to the organic- and silicone-based cosmetics, while providing cushion emollience, persisting and lubricious skin feel, high pigment wetting, and glossing films.

data.name: Bentone Gel® CAO V
data.description: BENTONE GEL CAO V is particularly useful in anhydrous systems, emulsions and can be used in cold process systems. It provides thermostable viscosity control of the emulsion's oil phase, improves application properties, enhances skin-feel by masking greasy or tacky components and imparts a pleasant residual silkiness to the skin.

Elementis
data.description: Elementis is a leading producer of specialty personal care ingredients. Every day, our personal care ingredients provide consumers the protection, moisturization and elegant sensorial experiences they need and want. We apply our advanced expertise in rheology as a global leader in active ingredients for antiperspirants. Our portfolio of green products includes natural clay rheology modifiers -- we own the world’s largest source of high-quality hectorite natural clay -- and bio-functional active ingredients.

EXPERTS.HEADING: Message Our Experts For a Fast Response

PERSONAL_CARE.TITLE: Healthy Beauty by DSM
PERSONAL_CARE.DESCRIPTION: DSM has taken an in-depth look at the growing enthusiasm for medical beauty to make the best skin care ingredients for non-invasive solutions.

BEAUTY.TITLE: Beauty by Lubrizol Life Science
BEAUTY.DESCRIPTION: LLS partners with customers to develop, manufacture and market a broad range of differentiated ingredients for skin care, hair care and skin cleansing.

PEAS.TITLE: Plant Proteins by Roquette
PEAS.DESCRIPTION: The products made with NUTRALYS® don't just nourish us today – they help us feed ourselves tomorrow too. Together, we are changing how the planet eats.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

ROW.TITLE: Knowde Software
ROW.DESCRIPTION: Use Knowde's software to power your internal business systems and drive growth.

0.TITLE: Knowde for Suppliers
0.DESCRIPTION: Transform how customers discover, engage and transact with you online with turnkey solutions for ingredient, polymer and chemical suppliers.

1.TITLE: Knowde for Distributors
1.DESCRIPTION: Delight both your principals and your customers with a modern online experience that differentiates your brand and accelerates business growth.

0.TITLE: Master Data Management Platform
0.DESCRIPTION: Digital transformation begins with clean data. Knowde organizes your structured product data in a matter of weeks.

1.TITLE: Customer Experience Application
1.DESCRIPTION: Knowde's turnkey application enables you to deliver an incredible customer experience on your website and turns it into a growth tool for your sales team.

2.TITLE: Knowde Marketplace
2.DESCRIPTION: Join the fastest growing marketplace for ingredients, polymers and chemicals. Get started for free!

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
